attributes.action: Allow students financial support from government/access to universal credit
attributes.additional_details: The economy has dropped 20% and it’s one of the toughest times to find a job right now. Especially when you are in full time education. The maintenance loan does not even take into account that in parts of the U.K. where living costs are higher, salaries tend to be so too. Some students loans aren’t even enough to cover the cost of their accommodation. Students may have to rely on food banks to eat. Allow students to claim for benefits such as universal credit or provide another form of support.
attributes.background: A maintenance loan alone is usually not enough to live on. Some students receive less than 4k a year. Provide students extra financial support or raise the maintenance loan. Due to covid-19 it’s near impossible to find a part time job right now and parents are struggling to support their kids.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Additional student loan payment to cover summer 2020 due to pandemic: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321805

Increase student maintenance loans for 2020/2021 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/314689

Allow full time students to claim universal credit during the Covid-19 pandemic: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304298
